name: Sophos Endpoint Protection
description: This app supports various investigative and containment actions on Sophos Endpoint Protection

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
List all the endpoints/sensors configured on the device

page_from_key.description: The key of the item from where to fetch a page

page_size.description: The size of the page requested

sort.description: Define how to sort the data (comma separated)

health_status.description: Get endpoints having any of the specified health status (comma separated)

type.description: Get endpoints having any of the specified endpoint type (comma separated)

lockdown_status.description: Get endpoints having any of the specified lockdown statuses (comma separated)

last_seen_before.description: Last seen after date and time (UTC) or duration inclusive

last_seen_after.description: Last seen before date and time (UTC) or duration exclusive

ids.description: Get endpoints having any of the specified ids (comma separated)

fields.description: The fields to return in a partial response

view.description: Type of view to be returned in response

search.description: Term to search for in the specified search fields

search_fields.description: List of search fields for finding the given search term (comma separated). Defaults to all applicable fields

actions.description: Send a request to the endpoint to check for Sophos management agent software updates
Turn Tamper Protection on or off on the endpoint
actions.verbose: Turn Tamper Protection on or off on the endpoint or generate a new Tamper Protection password. Note that Tamper Protection can be enabled for an endpoint only if it has also been enabled globally.

enabled.description: Whether Tamper Protection should be turned on for the endpoint

regenerate_password.description: Whether a new Tamper Protection password should be generated

actions.description: Get the Tamper Protection settings for the specified endpoint
Send a request to the specified endpoint to perform or configure a scan
Get the endpoint based on ID

fields.description: The fields to return in a partial response

view.description: Type of view to be returned in response

actions.description: Get all allowed or blocked items

page.description: The page number to fetch, starting with 1

page_size.description: The size of the page requested

items_type.description: Specifies the type of items to be fetched: blocked or allowed

actions.description: Delete the specified blocked or allowed item

item_id.description: The item ID to be deleted

item_type.description: Specifies the type of item to be deleted: blocked or allowed

actions.verbose: Block an item from exoneration by SHA256 checksum.

sha256.description: The SHA256 value for the application

certificate_signer.description: The value saved for the certificate signer

comment.description: Comment indicating why the item should be blocked

actions.verbose: Exempt an item from conviction by path, SHA256 checksum or certificate signer.

property_type.description: Specifies the property by which an item is allowed: path, sha256 or certificateSigner

sha256.description: The SHA256 value for the application

certificate_signer.description: The value saved for the certificate signer

comment.description: Comment indicating why the item should be allowed

origin_person_id.description: Person associated with the endpoint where the item to be allowed was last seen

origin_endpoint_id.description: Endpoint where the item to be allowed was last seen

page.description: The page number to fetch, starting with 1

page_size.description: The size of the page requested

category_id.description: The category Id associated with this local site

tags.description: An array of tags associated with this local site setting (comma separated)

comment.description: Comment indicating why the site should be added

actions.description: Get isolation settings for an endpoint
Turn on or off endpoint isolation for multiple endpoints

enabled.description: Whether the endpoints should be isolated

comment.description: Reason the endpoints should be isolated
